name: Tyotus Mobile
description:
TYOTUS MOBILE

Join Tyotus as he runs through the forest, dodging and shooting evil birds! Screenshot your score and challenge your friends!

Easy Mode: Shoot once every 3 seconds, fewer birds
Medium: Shoot once every 1.5 seconds, more birds
Hard: Shoot once every 0.3 seconds, a LOT of birds!

Special Thanks & Credits:
Capcom

Music:
HeatleyBros for Music
